GSD.product_version: versions from v3.10 to before v4.9.311
GSD.description:
scsi: pm8001: Fix abort all task initialization

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.311 by commit 9914461db82caee6c519acfbe10a86fe11bcdeca, it was introduced in version v3.10 by commit c6b9ef5779c3e1edfa9de949d2a51252bc347663. For more details please see the references link.
